GCCL Infrastruc Standalone September 2019 Net Sales at Rs 1.01 crore, down 41.82% Y-o-Y

07 Nov 2019


Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for GCCL Infrastructure & Projects are:

Net Sales at Rs 1.01 crore in September 2019 down 41.82% from Rs. 1.74 crore in September 2018.
Quarterly Net Loss at Rs. 0.48 crore in September 2019 down 84.4% from Rs. 0.26 crore in September 2018.

Close

EBITDA stands negative at Rs. 0.41 crore in September 2019 down 64% from Rs. 0.25 crore in September 2018.
